title: SET_HELI_COMBAT_OFFSET
content:
0x0A3F820A9A9A9AC5// SetHeliCombatOffset
void SET_HELI_COMBAT_OFFSET(Vehicle vehicle, float x, float y, float z);Parameters:vehicle: Helicopter for which the combat offset is being set.x: Offset along the X-axis (left/right) relative to the helicopter's current position and orientationy: Offset along the Y-axis (forward/backward) relative to the helicopter's current position and orientationz: Offset along the Z-axis (up/down) relative to the helicopter's current position and orientation.Set a specific offset for helis chasing target in combatNativeDB Introduced: v1180
codeBlocks:
// SetHeliCombatOffset
void SET_HELI_COMBAT_OFFSET(Vehicle vehicle, float x, float y, float z);
